examples: (1) The old lady placed great trust in her grandson.(2) The old man goes to see his grandson twice a week.(3) The old woman led her grandson by the arm.
(1) 那位老太太对她孙子非常信任。(2) 这位老人每星期去看他的孙子两次。(3) 那老婆婆牵着外孙的手。
1[N-COUNT 可数名词]（外）孙子；（外）孙女 Someone's  grandson is the son of their son or daughter.   [oft with poss]My grandson's birthday was on Tuesday.星期二是我孙子的生日。

translation: n. 奶奶
examples: (1) I can't believe, sometimes, that granny is dead. If I close my eyes I can just see her knitting away in that armchair as large as life, with her specs half-way down her nose.(2) My granny has always been good to me.
(1) 有时我真不相信祖母经去世。只要我闭上眼睛，就会看她活生生地坐在一把扶椅上，眼镜挂在鼻梁上，手里织着毛线衣。(2) 我外婆总是对我很好。
1[N-FAMILY 家庭成员名词]（外）祖母；奶奶；外婆 Some people refer to their grandmother as granny.   [INFORMAL 非正式]...my old granny.我年迈的祖母

translation: n.图表；示意图vt.(以图表)表示
examples: (1) The graph shows a bulge in the price of meat.(2) Our research results are displayed in the form of a graph.(3) This is a simple graph of legislative process.(4) Since they are equations we can graph them.
(1) 图表显示肉类价格上涨。(2) 我们的研究结果已用图表列出.(3) 这是立法过程的简易示意图。(4) 由于它们是方程,所以我们能以图来描绘。
A graph is a visual plotting of the relationship between two or more quantities, like a math map. To graph is to create such a chart.

The noun graph came into use in the 1800s, when people got tired of saying graphic formula and decided to chop it down. A hundred years later, the verb form of graph was first recorded. Diagram and linear representation are two synonyms for the word. The dancer Martha Graham said, “Every dance is a kind of fever chart, a graph of the heart.” Here, she uses graph to say that dance is a visual representation of what’s in the heart.
1[N-COUNT 可数名词]图；图表；曲线图 A graph is a mathematical diagram which shows the relationship between two or more sets of numbers or measurements.

translation: n.把握；领会；抓紧vt.领会；抓住；紧握
examples: (1) She has a good grasp of the English language.(2) She has a comprehensive grasp of the subject.(3) I kept her hands in my grasp.(4) I grasped the main point of the speech.(5) Few, if any, Americans grasp the significance of what have been accomplished(6) You must grasp this opportunity.(7) If you grasp this rope, I will pull you up.(8) Jean Valjean remained inert beneath Javert's grasp, like a lion submitting to the claws of a lynx.
(1) 她精通英语。(2) 她已全面掌握了这一学科。(3) 我紧握着她的手。(4) 我领会了这篇演讲的要点。(5) 很少(如果有的话)有美国人去领会已完成的工作的意义(6) 你必须抓住机会。(7) 如果你抓住这根绳子，我可把你拉起来。(8) 冉阿让在沙威的紧握下毫不动弹，好象狮子在忍受短尾山猫的爪子。

translation: n.重力；庄重；严重；严肃
examples: (1) He discoursed impressively on Newton's theory of gravity.(2) The stone rolled down the hill by gravity.(3) The force of gravity pulls things towards the earth's centre.(4) The lunar gravity is about one-sixth that on earth.(5) Each graduate behaved with gravity at it.(6) He doesn't seem to understand the gravity of the situation.(7) She does not know the gravity of her illness.(8) This is a matter of the utmost gravity.(9) He could hardly keep his gravity.
(1) 他讲述了牛顿的引力定律，给人以深刻的印象。(2) 石头在重力作用下向山下滚去。(3) 地心吸力把物体吸向地心。(4) 月亮的引力大约为地球的六分之一。(5) 每个毕业生都举止庄重。(6) 他似乎没有意识到形势的严重性。(7) 她不知道自己病情严重。(8) 这件事情十万火急。(9) 他忍不住要笑出来。

translation: n.希腊
examples: (1) The ship carried the national flag of Greece.(2) Ancient Greece was an advanced civilization.
(1) 那条船悬著希腊国旗。(2) 古希腊是个先进的文明国家。

translation: adj.贪婪的
examples: (1) He is a greedy capitalist.(2) He looked at the shop window with greedy eyes.
(1) 他是一个贪婪的资本家。(2) 他用贪婪的眼光看着商店的橱窗。

translation: adj.希腊的；希腊人的；希腊语的n.希腊人；希腊语
examples: (1) There are many perpendicular marble columns in Greek temples.(2) The chef is not interested in Greek food.(3) Now,"Psyche"is the old Greek word for soul and also for butterfly.(4) The Greek checked his cheeks on the weekend.(5) My friend speaks French and Greek.
(1) 希腊庙宇有很多垂直的大理石柱。(2) 厨师对希腊饭不感兴趣。(3) 噢，"波西卡"是古希腊语的一个词，是心灵和蝴蝶的意思。(4) 希腊人在周末检查了他的面颊。(5) 我的朋友会讲法语和希腊语。

translation: n.蔬菜水果商；菜贩
examples: (1) The greengrocer unloaded the potatoes from the van.(2) His father intended to set him up as a greengrocer.(3) We are at the greengrocer's now.
(1) 蔬菜水果商把土豆从车上卸下来。(2) 他的父亲打算让他做个蔬菜水果商。(3) 我们现在到菜店了。

translation: n.问候；打招呼
examples: (1) "How are you?" is a conventional greeting.(2) Her greeting was cold and strained.(3) He acknowledged the greeting with a nod.(4) He gave us a cheery greeting.
(1) “你好”是一个习惯问候语。(2) 她的问候冷淡而勉强。(3) 他点一点头，回答了对他的问候。(4) 他愉快地跟我们打招呼。

translation: n.烤架；铁格子；烧烤(食物)vt.拷问；(在烤架上)烤
examples: (1) We have to clean the grill before we start a fire.(2) Put the hamburgers on the grill.(3) There is no grill in Room Service.(4) He spent the summer bussing tables in a downtown grill.(5) Had he asked any friends to grill him in a mock interview?(6) Grill the sausages for ten minutes.(7) I sometimes grill food outdoors on coals .
(1) 在生火前我们必须把烤架清理干净。(2) 把汉堡牛排放到烤架上。(3) 客房服务部不卖烧烤的食品。(4) 整个夏季，他都在城里一个烧烤店帮助清理餐桌。(5) 他可曾请朋友向他提问，对他进行模拟面试?(6) 把香肠烤十分钟。(7) 有时我在户外用火炭烧烤食物。

translation: n.食品杂货商；杂货店
examples: (1) She is a Chinese grocer's daughter.(2) The grocer sparred with her outsdie his store.(3) There's a grocer's at the corner of the street.
(1) 她是个华裔食品杂货商的女儿。(2) 杂货商在店外和她吵起来了。(3) 在街道的转弯处有一个食品杂货店。

translation: n.【U】增长；生长；发展；种植n.【C】生长物；【医】瘤;赘生物
examples: (1) Their growth rate is quite slow, but continuous.(2) We are entering a period of rapid population growth.(3) Lack of demand will slow (down) our economic growth.(4) Cold weather retards the growth of the crops.(5) Magnesium is the nutrient element in plant growth.(6) The treatment arrested the growth of the disease.(7) It's the company's policy to sacrifice short-term profits for the sake of long-term growth.(8) Have an apple of our own growth.(9) The abandoned garden was left to a wanton growth of weeds.
(1) 其增长速度是相当缓慢,但持续。(2) 我们正在进入人类快速增长的时期。(3) 市场需求低就要拖慢我们的经济增长速度。(4) 寒冷的天气妨碍了庄稼生长。(5) 镁是植物生长的营养要素。(6) 治疗抑制了病情的发展。(7) 为长期发展而牺牲短期利润是公司的方针。(8) 尝尝我们自己种的苹果吧。(9) 荒园里杂草丛生。

translation: n.稀粥；麦片粥
examples: (1) My parents like eating gruel.(2) Gruel is convenient to make in the morning for breakfast.(3) We always have gruel for breakfast every morning.
(1) 我父母喜欢吃稀粥。(2) 吃早饭时，做稀粥是很方便的。(3) 我们每天早上都吃麦片粥当早餐。

translation: n.保证；保证书；担保；担保人；抵押品vt.保证；担保
examples: (1) A diploma is no guarantee of efficiency.(2) I guarantee that this will not happen again.(3) We guarantee the fastness of these dyes.(4) If the guarantee goes to Beijing to petition again, then the four guarantors will lose their jobs.(5) Article 7 Guarantors should not provide guarantee for money-losingoverseas enterprises.(6) I can offer my land as a guarantee.(7) The guard guards the guarantee in the garden regardless of the hazard.(8) A diploma is no guarantee of efficiency.(9) We paid large fees to the Loan Guarantee Board.(10) We guarantee the fastness of these dyes.

(1) 持有文凭不能保证工作效率一定高。(2) 我保证此类事情不会再发生。(3) 我们担保这些染料不褪色。(4) 如果被担保的人再次去北京上访，这四个担保人将丢失他们的工作。(5) 第七条担保人不得为经营亏损企业提供对外担保。(6) 我可拿出我的地产作抵押品。(7) 卫兵不顾危险看守着花园里的抵押品。(8) 持有文凭不能保证工作效率一定高。(9) 我们付给了贷款保证委员会大笔的费用。(10) 我们担保这些染料不褪色。

translation: v.看守；守卫；保卫；提防n.警戒；哨兵；防护装置；警卫；【体】后卫
examples: (1) He keeps a dog to guard the house.(2) The dog guarded the house against strangers.(3) You must guard against catching a cold.(4) Be on guard when somebody flatters you.(5) He hit him when his guard was down.(6) A sentry stood on guard at the corner.(7) The guard did not quit his post all night long.(8) Miners wore a helmet as a guard against falling rocks.(9) The guard unlocked the cuffs of the prisoner.
(1) 他养一条狗看家。(2) 狗守卫着房屋，不让陌生人进去。(3) 你必须小心以防感冒。(4) 有人奉承你时，一定要当心。(5) 他乘其不备击中了他。(6) 一个哨兵在角落里站岗。(7) 那个哨兵整夜都没有离开他的哨位。(8) 矿工头戴钢盔, 防护落下的岩石。(9) 警卫打开了囚犯的手铐。

translation: n.客人；宾客；特别来宾；[动植物]寄生生物v.做特邀嘉宾；做特约演员；客串；招待；做客
examples: (1) They are coming to the party as my guests.(2) These Indian guest are familiar with this book.(3) She deleted our names from the guest list.(4) She made a guest appearance on his TV show.(5) She guested on several chat shows while visiting Britain.(6) He guested on a television series.
(1) 他们作为我的客人出席晚会。(2) 这些印度客人对这本书很熟悉。(3) 她把我们的名字从宾客名单中删去了。(4) 她在他的电视节目中出场客串。(5) 她访问英国时做过几个访谈节目的特邀嘉宾。(6) 他客串了一个电视系列剧。

translation: n.指导；引导；导航
examples: (1) Under his guidance, we finished the work smoothly.(2) She is a marriage guidance counselor.(3) Religion provides many people with guidance.(4) We should not do anything under the guidance of instincts.(5) The airplane has a sophisticated electronic guidance system.
(1) 在他的指导下，我们顺利地完成了工作。(2) 她是婚姻问题的顾问。(3) 宗教为很多人起到引导的作用。(4) 我们不应该凭着直觉做事情。(5) 这架飞机有一套尖端的电子导航系统。

translation: adj.有罪的；内疚的
examples: (1) The court found him guilty.(2) The man was proved guilty of murder.(3) A man is accounted innocent until he is proven guilty.(4) His answer evidenced a guilty conscience.(5) He had no sense of shame and never felt guilty.
(1) 法官判他有罪。(2) 这个男子被证实犯了杀人罪。(3) 一个人未被证明有罪前，被视为是清白的。(4) 他的回答证明他良心有愧。(5) 他毫无羞耻之心，而且从不觉得内疚。

translation: n.吉他
examples: (1) He plays the guitar and sings too.(2) I write my own songs and I play the guitar as well.(3) It is fun to play the guitar.(4) He sat there strumming a guitar.(5) Doubtless he'll be bringing his guitar, as usual.
(1) 他会弹吉他，也会唱歌。(2) 我唱自己谱曲的歌，也弹吉他。(3) 弹吉他是好玩的。(4) 他坐在那儿漫不经心地弹吉他。(5) 他很可能跟平常一样会带吉他来。

translation: n.枪；炮；节流阀vt.枪击；打开节流阀vi.用枪打猎
examples: (1) The gun has a carry of 400 yards.(2) He was clubbed to death with a butt of a gun.(3) It's illegal to carry guns in our country.(4) The soldier saw a gun jutting out from a bush.(5) The gun has an elevation of 45 degrees.(6) Two soldiers dismounted the gun from the base.(7) I saw them gun down innocent women and children.
(1) 这枪的射程为四百码。(2) 他是被人用枪托殴打致死的。(3) 在我们国家，携带枪支是违法的。(4) 那士兵看见一支枪从矮树丛伸出来。(5) 这门炮的仰角为45度。(6) 两个战士把炮从底座上卸下来。(7) 我看到他们枪杀无辜的妇女和儿童。

translation: n.体育馆；健身房；体育课
examples: (1) The basketball players are working out at the gym.(2) We go to play badminton in the nearest gym every Sunday.(3) He often went to the gym to harden his muscles.(4) I did a two-hour workout in the gym.(5) You are supposed to wear sneakers in gym class.
(1) 篮球运动员们正在体育馆进行训练。(2) 每个星期天我们都去最近的体育馆打羽毛球。(3) 他过去常到健身房锻炼肌肉。(4) 我在健身房锻炼了两个小时。(5) 体育课上你应该穿运动鞋。

translation: n.体操
examples: (1) When she was young she practiced gymnastics.(2) The sport of gymnastics is popular in our country.
(1) 她年轻时练过体操。(2) 体操运动在我国很流行。

translation: n.金质奖章；金牌
examples: (1) Jack was decorated with a gold medal.(2) He carried off the first- class gold medal for painting.(3) She won an Olympic gold medal in swimming.(4) He is sure have a chance of a gold medal.
(1) 杰克被授予金质奖章。(2) 他荣获绘画一等金质奖章。(3) 她获得奥林匹克游泳金牌。(4) 他肯定可望得金牌了。
1[N-COUNT 可数名词]金牌；金质奖章 A gold medal is a medal made of gold which is awarded as first prize in a contest or competition.

translation: n. 游戏；比赛adj. 勇敢的vi. 赌博n. (Game)人名；(英)盖姆；(法)加姆；(西)加梅
examples: All the children partook in the game.I found a computer game to divert the children.He is my main rival in the game.He is expected to win the game with ease.Would you care to have a small wager on the game?In every game they were bested by their opponents.The game is 7 to 6.The natives use poisoned arrows to kill big game.The politician was playing a deep game.After two hours his game was about played out.It's a pity he games so deep.She put up a game fight against her detractors.He was a game fighter even when he was losing.Are you game for a swim?He is game in the leg/has a game leg.
所有孩子都参加了游戏。我发现了一种供孩子娱乐的电脑游戏。他是我运动会上的主要对手。预计他在比赛中会轻易获胜。你愿意在这场比赛上下个小赌注吗？每一场比赛他们都被对方击败。比分是7比6。土著用毒箭射杀大猎物。那名政客在耍诡计花招。两小时以后,他所有的花招差不多要使完了。他如此沉溺于赌博,真遗憾。她勇敢对抗那些诽谤她的人。即使当他失败的时候, 他也是一位勇敢的战士。你愿意去游泳吗他腿瘸（有一只瘸腿）.

translation: n. 花园；菜园vt. 栽培花木vi. 从事园艺；在园中种植n. (Garden)人名；(英、意、巴基)加登
examples: Mary talked with me across the garden fence.He dunged his vegetable garden regularly.He's been gardening all day.
玛丽和我隔着花园篱笆交谈。他经常给他的菜园施肥。他在园中干了一整天。

translation: n. 大门；出入口；门道vt. 给…装大门n. (Gate)人名；(英)盖特；(法、瑞典)加特
examples: There are soldiers on guard at the gate.The gate is too narrow for a car.The carriage passed through the palace gate.Passengers for Madrid, gate number two.There has been a radio message from the captain, and a security guard has gone to the gate to meet the flight.Today's gate will be given to charity.
大门口有士兵在守卫。大门太窄，汽车进不去。马车进入了宫殿的大门。去马德里的乘客，二号登机门。机长发来了一份无线电报。一个保安人员已去出入口等候这架班机。今日的门票收入将捐献给慈善事业。

translation: n. 地理；地形
examples: How's the new geography teacher?The geography paper was difficult.I have only a sketchy knowledge of geography.He studied physical geography.I'd like you to meet my geography professor.
新的地理老师怎么样？地理试题很难。我对地理只是一知半解。他研究自然地理。我想介绍我的地理老师给你认识。

translation: n. 德国
examples: Germany is a European country.I need to buy a round trip ticket to Germany.
德国是一个欧洲国家。我需要一张飞德国的往返机票。

translation: vt. 使得；获得；受到；变成n. 生殖；幼兽vi. 成为；变得；到达
examples: The problem is when to get the money we need.If Peter had applied for the post, he would probably get it now.She soon got the children ready for school.Do you think you'll get the work finished on time?She tried to get a grip on the icy rock.We will find ways to get over the difficulties.I don't get your meaning.What gets me is having to do the same thing all day long.She gets really bad headaches.Can we get to the station in time?You'll get there in the end if you work hard!
问题是什么时候能得到我们所需要的钱。要是彼得申请了那职位,他很可能现在就得到了。她很快帮孩子做好上学的准备。你认为你的工作可以如期完成吗？她尽力抓住那冰冷的石头。我们会找到克服困难的办法。我不明白你的意思。使我感到烦恼的是整天都得干同样的事。她经常头痛得厉害。我们能及时到达车站吗？你如果努力工作, 最终会达到目的的。

translation: 聚会；聚集；收集；积累
examples: At the party, everybody mixed together happily.They get together once a year at Christmas time.The chaperon grouped the younger children together.The four sisters assembled at home to get ready.Trying to get the divorced couple to agree calls for a great deal of diplomacy.And all the project and activities should be done only after discussion and get the consistence.
在聚会中，大家相处一起很开心。他们每年圣诞节时聚会一次。那年长女伴将年纪较小的孩子聚集在一起。姐妹四个聚集在家里，一切都准备就绪。要使这对离婚夫妇达成一致需要处事极为圆通。任何项目和活动都应事先沟通，达成一致意见后方可执行。

translation: n. 女孩；姑娘，未婚女子；女职员，女演员；（男人的）女朋友n. （捷）吉尔
examples: The girl has a light hand for knitting.My father left me forever when I was only a girl.This picture represents a girl playing the piano.The girl stood shivering with cold on the doorstep.My little girl is at primary school.There are 25 girl students in our class as against only 5 in Class Two.The girl dress in the shop window suddenly attracted my eyes.Is it a girl dog or a boy dog?
这女孩手巧，精于编织。在我还是小女孩时,我父亲就已去世了。这幅画描绘一个在弹钢琴的少女。那姑娘站在门前的台阶上,冷得直打哆嗦。我小女儿在上小学。我们班有25名女学生，而二班只有5名。商店橱窗里那件女式连衣裙一下子吸引了我的眼球。这是一只母狗还是一只公狗？

translation: vt. 给；产生；让步；举办；授予n. 弹性；弯曲；伸展性vi. 捐赠；面向；有弹性；气候转暖n. (Give)人名；(意)吉韦
examples: Would you please give me a piece of paper?He give me a box in which to keep the toy.He gives generously to the poor.I'm giving all my friends books for Christmas.He gave a bunch of flowers to his girlfriend.He is willing to stand in and give ten yuan to the funds.Can you give me any information on this matter?The sun gives us warmth and light.The bass was to give a concert in the park.I'm giving a dinner party next Friday evening; would you like to come?The branch began to give under his weight.This rope has too much give in it.There is no give in a stone floor.
能给我一张纸吗？他给了我一个装着玩具的盒子。他慷慨地施舍给穷人。我在圣诞节要向所有的朋友赠书。他送给女友一束花。他愿意参加这一活动并捐助十元。关于此事，你能给我提供什么消息吗？太阳供给我们温暖和光。那位男低音歌唱家将在公园中举行音乐会。下星期五晚上我举行宴会，您肯赏光吗？他身体的重量把树枝压弯了。这条绳子弹性太大.石头铺的地面毫无弹性。

translation: adj. 高兴的；乐意的vt. 使......高兴n. (Glad)人名；(塞、瑞典)格拉德；(英)格莱德；(法、挪)格拉
examples: I'm glad to hear he's feeling better.I am glad we have come together at last.I'd be glad to lend you the money.If you'd like me to help you, I'd be only too glad to.
听说他身体好些了，我很高兴。很高兴我们终于取得了一致。我很乐意借给你钱。若要我帮忙，我十分乐意相助。

translation: n. 玻璃；玻璃制品；镜子vt. 反映；给某物加玻璃vi. 成玻璃状n. (Glass)人名；(英、法、德、意)格拉斯
examples: I cut my hand on some broken glass.I ran up against a glass door and hurt my head.He put down his glass.The milk slopped over the rim of the glass.All our glass and china is kept in the cupboard.Only three windows had been glassed.He put his glass down on the circular table.
碎玻璃割伤了我的手。我撞到一扇玻璃门上，把头撞伤了。他放下杯子。牛奶溢到玻璃杯外面来了。我们所有的玻璃和陶瓷器皿都放在柜橱里。只有三个窗镶上了玻璃。他把眼镜摘下来放在圆桌上。

translation: n. 手套vt. 给…戴手套
examples: It's getting cool and I have to take out my woolen gloves.The finger of my glove has a hole.I rarely lose a left-hand glove.I showed the customer the glove section.The mother carefully gloved the little baby.
天气变冷了，我不得不把毛线手套拿出来了。我手套的指头处有个洞。我很少脱下左手手套。我给那位顾客指出了卖手套的地方。这位母亲细心地给婴儿戴上手套。

translation: vi. 走；达到；运转；趋于n. 去；进行；尝试vt. 忍受；出产；以…打赌[复数 goes 第三人称单数 goes 过去式 went 过去分词 gone 现在分词 going]
examples: We' ll go for a walk if you feel like it.I must be going.A few days later, things started to go wrong.Everything went very smoothly.The boat rolled gently with the come and go of small waves.Let's have a go at it.She's always so full of go.There is too much in the British Museum for us to take in at one go.
你愿意的话,咱们就去散散步。我该走了。几天后,事情开始变糟。一切进展顺利。小船随着细浪来回轻轻荡漾。让我们来试试。她总是充满精力。大英博物馆有那么多的知识,我们去一次是学不完的。

translation: n. 目标；球门，得分数；终点vi. 攻门，射门得分
examples: No. 6 gave a long shot, but missed the goal.He has achieved his goal.If we lose sight of the goal, we cease to be Communists.That last goal was a beauty.He kicked a penalty goal in the football match.
6号来了一个长射，但没有射中球门。他已经实现了他的目标。如果忘记了这个目标，我们就不再是共产党员了。最後进去的那个球真漂亮。在这场足球赛中，他主罚，踢进了一个球。

translation: n. 高尔夫球；高尔夫球运动vi. 打高尔夫球n. (Golf)人名；(西、挪)戈尔夫
examples: Let's play a round of golf.I have a special liking for golf.He won the golf match by two shots.Now he's getting towards retirement age he's started playing golf.He plays golf nearly every weekend.I think fishing is more relaxing than playing golf.
我们打一场高尔夫球吧。我特别喜欢高尔夫球运动。他以两杆的成绩赢得了这场高尔夫球赛。他因接近退休年龄，就打起高尔夫球来了。他差不多每个周末都打高尔夫球。我认为钓鱼比打高尔夫球更使人放松舒坦。

translation: adj. 好的；优良的；愉快的；虔诚的n. 好处；善行；慷慨的行为adv. 好n. (Good)人名；(英)古德；(瑞典)戈德
examples: A good video camera will cost you a lot of money.My one good suit is at the cleaner's.If you train hard, you'll make a good footballer.Complaining won't do you any good.Good is rewarded with evil.
一台好的摄像机要花掉你很多钱。我那套讲究的衣服还在洗衣店里呢。你要刻苦训练就能成为优秀的足球运动员。抱怨对你没有任何好处。善有恶报。

translation: int. 再见；告别
examples: Amid all the rush and confusion she forgot to say goodbye.I'd like to say goodbye to you all.Amidst all the rush and confusion she forgot to say goodbye.Goodbye till we meet again.Goodbye, and all the best!"Did you see Robert safely off?" "At half past six in the morning? No fear! We said goodbye last night."Goodbye I'd better be pushing along now.Nothing remains except for me to say goodbye.
她在忙乱中忘记了告辞。我想向你们大家告别了。她在忙乱中忘记了告辞。再见。再见，祝你一切顺利！"你把罗伯特平安地送走了吗？""你是说早上6：30吗？没有，我们昨晚就分了手。"再见吧--我现在该走了。最后我该说一声再见了。

translation: int. 天哪n. 善良，优秀 ；精华，养分
examples: He keeps extolling her goodness.Does goodness charm more than beauty?She's the very incarnation of goodness.Goodness often charms more than mere beauty.He was as ready to absorb every bit of goodness in a thing as he was lavish in singing its praises.
他对她的善良赞不绝口。善良是否比美色更为人们所欣赏？她是美德的化身。美德比徒具美貌更迷人。正如他在歌声中极力颂扬的美好的事物一样，他也乐意吸收一样事物中点滴的精华。

translation: n. 年级；等级；成绩；级别；阶段vt. 评分；把…分等级vi. 分等级；逐渐变化n. (Grade)人名；(英)格雷德；(法、德、西、葡、塞、瑞典)格拉德
examples: This grade of wool can be sold at a fairly low price.He's not in the first grade as a musician.He is in the third grade.He received a failing grade on the term paper.They grade eggs before they send them to the shops.How does a professor grade a student's work?The colors graded gradually from orange to yellow.
这种等级的羊毛只能以相当低的价格卖出。他不是第一流的音乐家。他读三年级。他的期末报告不及格。他们先把鸡蛋分等再送往商店。一个教授是怎样给学生打分的?这些颜色逐渐地从橙色变成黄色。

translation: vt. 授予…学位；分等级；标上刻度vi. 毕业；渐变n. 研究生；毕业生adj. 毕业的；研究生的
examples: He is a graduate in medicine.He is a graduate of Tokyo University.They graduate 30,000 engineers every year.This ruler is graduated in centimeters.The salary scale is graduated so that you get more money each year.He will graduate from the school in May.He eventually graduated from clerical work to his present role.She was taken on as a graduate trainee.When did Zack graduate from Seaside High?
他是医科毕业生。他是东京大学的毕业生。每年有3万名工程师从学校毕业。这把尺的刻度是厘米。工资划分成各个等级,因此职工逐年获得加薪。他将要在五月份毕业。最终他从普通文员逐渐发展到现在的职位。她应聘为新毕业的实习生。扎克何时从海滨高中毕业的？

translation: adj. 宏伟的；豪华的；极重要的n. 大钢琴；一千美元n. (Grand)人名；(法)格朗；(英、瑞典)格兰德
examples: This is a grand occasion.He was born in the purple and was brought up in the grand palace.How grand the mountains look in the early evening!The piano soon developed into the contemporary nine- to ten-foot concert grand.It'll cost you 50 grand!
这是个盛大的场面。他出身于皇族,在宏伟的宫殿中长大。暮色中群山是多么壮丽！不久钢琴就发展到同时代的九到十英尺的平台大钢琴。那要5万元!

translation: n. 奶奶；外婆
examples: Grandpa and grandma sat in the back of the car.Grandma was a good teller of stories.Grandma sealed the jam in the jar.I'm thinking of going to my grandma's.
爷爷和奶奶坐在汽车後排的座位上。奶奶很会讲故事。外婆把果酱密封在罐子里。我想去外婆家。

translation: n. 祖母；女祖先vt. 当…的祖母vi. 当祖母
examples: Grandmother used to darn her own stockings.She helped take care of her aged grandmother.
祖母过去总是自己织补袜子。她帮助照料年迈的祖母。

translation: n. 葡萄；葡萄酒；葡萄树；葡萄色n. (Grape)人名；(法)格拉普；(德、瑞典)格拉佩
examples: The loser's scorn for the award is pure sour grape.Sour grape can never make sweet wine.The sun shines through the grape-leaves.We need this piece of cloth to be grape.A grape of pellets were shot into a bear.
失败者对奖品的轻视纯粹是吃不到葡萄说葡萄酸。酸葡萄酿不出甜酒。太阳从葡萄树叶中穿过。我们需要这块布是深紫色的。一串葡萄弹射中了一只狗熊。

translation: n. 草；草地，草坪vt. 放牧；使……长满草；使……吃草vi. 长草n. (Grass)人名；(法、德、俄、瑞典、英)格拉斯
examples: The grass was wet with dew.Father was cutting the grass, and meanwhile mother was planting roses.We play football on the grass.She sat down on a tuft of grass.They put out their horse to grass every day.The cows were turned out to grass.The hut was made of poles covered with grass mats.Whitman writes about how grass covers the world and feeds us.Mike must have grassed on us.
草被露水打湿了。父亲在剪草,母亲在种玫瑰。我们在草地上踢足球。她坐在一小块草地上。他们每天把马放出去吃草。牛被放出来吃草。茅屋用木杆搭成，上面以草席覆盖。惠特曼描写草如何覆盖这个世界并喂养了我们。麦克一定告发了我们。

translation: adj. 感谢的；令人愉快的，宜人的
examples: I can't express how grateful I am.These refugees are very grateful to the government's succor.I am grateful for all your past kindness.I'd be grateful if you should let me know as soon as possible.The trees afford grateful shade.
我说不出我有多么感激。这些难民非常感激政府的救援。多蒙关照,万分感激。你若能让我尽快知道,我会很感激的。这些树能为（行人)提供纳凉之所。

translation: adj. 伟大的，重大的；极好的，好的；主要的n. 大师；大人物；伟人们
examples: What a great idea!This cake tastes great.We had a great day.No one would deny that Beethoven's symphonies are great masterpieces.The great issues of the day are education and employment.He has rendered me great help in time of need.
好主意！这块蛋糕吃起来很不错。我们度过了美好的一天。人人都认为贝多芬的交响乐是伟大的杰作。当前的重要问题是教育和就业。在我贫困时,他给了我不少的帮助。

translation: adj. 绿色的；青春的n. 绿色；青春vt. 使…变绿色vi. 变绿色n. (Green)人名；(英、意)格林；(瑞典、芬)格伦
examples: The paper turned green as if by magic.The green fields came into sight.The country is very green in spring.Starch is an unharmful and green material.I would rather be called green than pretend to be an old dog.These tomatoes are still too green to pick.Green was the predominant color in the forest.The room was decorated in bright green.He peppered the ball across the green.Our lawn grass does not green up until the middle of May.Mr. Green spoke highly of our city.
这纸魔术般地变成了绿色。一片绿色的田野展现在眼前。春天的时候，乡村一片青葱碧绿。淀粉化学品是一种有利于环保的绿色物质。我你给宁愿人家说我没有经验,也不要装老手。这些番茄还未成熟,不能摘采。绿色是森林的主色调。这房间以鲜艳的绿色装饰著。他一下子把球猛击过草地。我们的草坪要到五月中旬才变绿。格林先生很称赞我们的城市。

translation: vt. 欢迎，迎接；致敬，致意；映入眼帘n. (Greet)人名；(英)格里特
examples: I greet you in the name of the President.He greeted her with a loving hug.They greet each other with a hug and say Merry Christmas!Mick greeted her with a kiss on each cheek.Tom gravely steps forward to greet us.At the wedding reception,the bride and groom greet their guests.The audience greet his speech with loud cheer.
我代表总统前来迎接您。他以一个深情的拥抱来迎接她。他们互相拥抱,互相问候圣诞快乐!米克亲吻她的双颊以表问候。汤姆庄严地走过来，向我们致意。在婚礼招待会上，新郎和新娘要向来宾致意。听众对他的演讲报以高声欢呼。

translation: adj. 灰色的；灰白的vt. 使变成灰色；使变老vi. 变成灰色；老化n. 灰色n. (Grey)人名；(英、法)格雷
examples: Have you any grey pullovers in stock?Today, the canopy of the heavens is grey.The most popular color this autumn is grey.The ashes from burnt grass make a good grey.Wood turns grey if weathered for a long time.My black hair has turned completely grey.
你们有灰色套头毛衣的现货吗？今天的天幕是灰色的。今年最流行灰色。草灰可以成为很好的灰色染料。木材如果风干时间较长就变成灰色。我的黑发已全部变成灰色。

translation: adj. 灰色的；苍白的；灰白头发的；阴郁的n. 灰色；暗淡的光线vi. 成为灰色或灰白vt. 使成灰色或灰白n. (Gray)人名；(意)格拉伊；(英、法、葡、瑞典)格雷
examples: This monk wears a gray frock.His hair became gray when he was only forty.He dressed in gray.A horse and foal stand out against the gray of the English moors.The sea had been  rough and the skies gray almost all the way over.
这个和尚穿着灰色的僧袍。他刚刚四十岁时，头发就变得灰白了。他穿灰色衣服。一匹野马和她的幼驹站在雾茫茫的英格兰荒野上。几乎一路上都是海浪汹涌，天空灰朦朦的。

translation: n. 食品杂货店食品杂货
examples: Her mother began to operate a small grocery.She summed up the bills from the grocery with great care.He's bound up with the grocery trade in some way or another.A new supermarket opened across the street, and Peter's grocery business was soon in a bad way.
她母亲开始经营一家小杂货店。她非常仔细地合计那些来自食品杂货店的帐单。他同食品杂货业有着某种密切的关系。街对面开了一家新的超级市场,这使彼得的杂货店的生意马上萧条下来。

translation: n. 地面；土地；范围；战场;根据vt. 使接触地面；打基础；使搁浅vi. 着陆；搁浅adj. 土地的；地面上的；磨碎的；磨过的v. 研磨（grind的过去分词）；压迫
examples: You shouldn't sit on the ground when it's wet.The expedition covered a lot of ground.Boredom is not a ground for divorce.There is no point in going over the same ground twice.It said that they were all trying to find the common ground.Most stock markets lost ground after their recent gains.Germany in the 1920s and 30s was fertile ground for such ideas.All aircrafts at London Airport were grounded by fog today.His parents grounded him for two weeks.They grounded their arms to show surrender.The ship was grounded in shallow water.She grounded her pupils well in arithmetic.
地面潮湿时就不应该坐在地上。探险队到过很多地方。日久生厌不能成为离婚的理由。把同样的主题重温两遍根本就没有什么意义。据说他们都在努力找到共同立场。大多数证券市场在最近的盈利之后出现了水平下滑的趋势。20世纪二三十年代的德国以这些观念的盛行为背景。因大雾天气,今天伦敦机场的所有飞机都被迫停飞。他父母把他关在家里两个星期。他们把武器放在地上以示投降。船在水浅处搁浅。她给自己的学生打下良好的算术基础。

translation: n. 组；团体adj. 群的；团体的vi. 聚合vt. 把…聚集；把…分组
examples: She has a very wide group of friends.A group of boys dashed out of the classroom.That group harmonizes well.He is a the most brisk young man in this group.He broke away from that lawless group years ago.The company formerly belonged to an international banking group.They encouraged the workers to group together.The photograph will look nice if we group the family around the piano.We can group animals into many types.
她有一大群朋友。一群男孩子从教室里冲出来。那一组用和声演唱得很出色。他是这个小组中最活跃的年轻人。他在几年前脱离了那个非法团体。该公司以前隶属于一个国际银行集团。他们鼓励工人们团结起来。如果我们全家人围在钢琴周围照片会好看些。我们可以把动物分成很多种类。

translation: vi. 发展；生长；渐渐变得…vt. 使生长；种植；扩展n. (Grow)人名；(英)格罗
examples: How tall you've grown!Plants cannot grow well in the absence of water.She is growing into a beautiful young woman.This district used to grow cotton on a large scale.She has a hot temper, but you will soon grow to like her.
你都长这麽高了!没有水,植物就不能茁壮地生长。她渐渐出落成美丽的姑娘。这个地区过去大量种棉花。她脾气躁，但不久你就会喜欢她了。

translation: vt. 猜测；认为；推测；猜中vi. 猜；推测；猜中n. 猜测；推测n. (Guess)人名；(英)格斯；(德)居斯
examples: I don't really know, I'm just guessing.We could only guess at her motives.She guessed the right answer at once.He guessed the number of the beans in the jar.I guess he was wrong.I'll give you three guesses.My guess is that he didn't come because his parents wouldn't let him do.
我真的不知道, 我仅仅是猜想。我们只能猜测她的动机她立刻猜出了正确的答案。他猜出了缸里豆子有多少。我想他错了我让你猜三次。我想,他没来是因为父母不让他来。

translation: n. 指南；向导；入门书vt. 引导；带领；操纵vi. 担任向导n. (Guide)人名；(法、葡)吉德
examples: I know the place well, so let me be your guide.As a university graduate, I am seeking a job as a tourist guide.These philosophical views serve as a guide in life.His elder sister had been his guide, counsellor and friend.His entire life was guided by his religious beliefs.If I lose my way, you guide me and cheer me on.He guided the man through the streets to the railway station.
我熟悉那地方作为一名大学毕业生,我正在谋求一份当导游的工作。这些哲学观点可以作为处世指南。他姐姐过去一直指导他，给他出主意，是他的朋友。他的宗教信仰指导了他的整个人生。我迷失方向时,你会引导我,鼓励我。他带这个人走过街道到火车站。

translation: n. 体育馆；健身房
examples: The child somersaulted across the gymnasium.A new gymnasium has been built on our campus.Our gymnasium lacks sports facilities.He go to the gymnasium to practise every day.
那孩子翻著跟头从体育馆这头翻到那头。我们大学的校园里新建了一座体育馆。我们的健身房缺少运动器材。他每天都去健身房训练。

translation: 与…和睦相处；取得进展
examples: They are on good terms with each other.We soon became friendly with the couple next door.His work is going along tip-top.The work was coming along quite well.
他们友好相处。我们很快就和隔壁的夫妇友好相处了。他的工作进展得非常顺利。工作进展得相当顺利。

translation: 离开；逃脱；出发
examples: This gives the lizard time to get away.I don't really believe you can get away with it.I had to get out of that house in disguise.He hasn't been away from home before.
这就给了蜥蜴逃脱的时间。我不太相信你能逃脱得了。我不得不化了装离开那屋子。以前他从没有离开过家。

translation: 回来；恢复；取回；报复；重新上台
examples: I never lend books; you never get them back.The democrats hope to get back at the next election.
我的书决不外借，因为总是有去无回。民主党希望在下次大选中重新执政。

translation: 下来；吞下；使沮丧
examples: The medicine is too bitter to get down.Let's strip away the cant and get down to bedrock.He got down to his work after the holidays.He jotted down a note for her and then left.Wash the dry cake down with tea.I hate to have to choke down these pills.Susan was completely weighed down by the stress of examinations.It is likely that she will be crushed down by the bad news.I think you will like to get down to work now.They set out to drive a well to get well water.
药太苦了，吞不下去。咱们少说漂亮话，多谈实质问题吧。度假之後他开始专心工作。他匆匆为她写下了一个条子然后离开了。用茶把乾蛋糕咽下去。我讨厌不得不费力地去咽下这些药片。苏珊被考试的压力压垮了。很可能她会被这可悲的消息压垮。我想现在你要认真着手工作。他们着手凿井取水。

translation: 开始认真考虑；着手处理
examples: He got down to his work after the holidays.The masonry of the old building began to crumble.I think you will like to get down to work now.He knows how to go about repairing the machine.
度假之後他开始专心工作。旧楼房的砖石结构开始崩落。我想现在你要认真着手工作。他知道怎样着手修理这台机器。

translation: 进入；到达；陷入；收获
examples: He invited me to get in the car and go for a ride with him.He has been trying for years to get in that club.The plane got in on time.The Conservatives got in by a small majority.He took the entrance exam but didn't get in.We must get the doctor in.The commune members were busy getting in the crops.The government gets the taxes in quite efficiently.The company is trying to get in all its outstanding debts.We must get some wine in for the dinner party.I got in an hour's work while the baby was asleep.She talks so much that it's impossible to get a word in.
他邀请我上车，与他一起兜风。几年来他一直争取加入那个俱乐部。飞机准时到达。保守党人以微弱多数当选。他参加了入学考试但未被录取。我们得请医生来。公社社员们正忙着收割庄稼。政府收税相当有成效。公司正设法收回全部积欠的债款。我们必须为晚宴买一些酒。我趁孩子睡觉抽空干了一小时的活。她说个没完，别人休想插话。

translation: v. 动身；免于受罚；从…下来；脱下（衣服等）
examples: Jason saw me and got off the horse immediately.A good lawyer might be able to get you off.We will get off after breakfast.What time will you get off tomorrow?
杰逊看到我，立即从马上下来。请位好律师有可能使你免受追究。我们将于早餐后出发。你明天什么时候动身?

translation: 上车，上马；进展，使前进
examples: She got on the bus and picked a seat up front.He can always get on well with his colleagues.
她上了公车,找了个最前面的座位。他总能和同事们和睦相处。

translation: vt. 在…获得成功，与…友好相处；继续干
examples: The research project dragged on for months.John hasn't been able to get anywhere despite his hard work.Let's sum up our experience before going on.Don't dilly-dally, just get on with it!
这个研究是项目几个月来没有取得进展。约翰尽管工作努力，但仍未取得进展。在继续做之前我们先来总结一下经验吧。别磨磨蹭蹭的，继续做吧！

translation: 通过；到达；做完；接通电话；度过，熬过(困难时期等)
examples: I think you will get through.The candidates didn't all get through.If more supplies do not get through in time, thousands of refugees will die.It took us only a few minutes to get through the Customs.I cannot think how they will get through the time.We need more rain to get through the summer.He can not get through the day without at least a cup of coffee.I couldn't get through.I find her impossible to get through to.I explained once again, but I still couldn't get through to him.
我想你是能通过的。报考者没有全部通过。如果更多的救济品不能及时到达的话，数以千计地难民将要死亡。我们的海关检查只花了几分钟时间。我不能想象，这段时间他们将怎样度过。我们需要更多的雨水去度过夏天。没有至少一杯咖啡他没法度过这一天。我打不通电话。我发觉无法跟她沟通思想。我又解释了一遍，但他仍然不懂我的意思。

translation: 起床，起立；建造；增加；打扮；伪造
examples: She got up at the crack of dawn.He was pleased to get up to the singing of birds.The wind is getting up.We're getting up a party for her birthday.He's been getting up to his old tricks again!She's busy getting up the American constitution for tomorrow's exam.The class got up when the teacher came in.She was got up as an Indian princess.She got herself up in a new dress.
天刚亮她便起床了。他很高兴起床听到鸟的歌唱。风越刮越大。我们要给她开生日庆祝会。他又要重施故技了。她忙著温习美国宪法，准备明天的考试。老师进来时全班起立。她被打扮成了印度公主。她穿上了新洋装。

translation: 赠送；丧失；泄露
examples: He would rather give away a point than claim an advantage.He wants to give away all his modern possessions and return to nature.He decide to give away everything he possessed and become a monk.He was given away by one of his accomplices.Don't give away to the public when we will start.I wish he wouldn't give the show away.
他宁愿送分数，也不愿要求利益。他要舍弃一切时髦的东西而归真返璞。他决定放弃他所有的一切，出家为僧。他被他的一个同谋者出卖了。不要向公众泄露我们出发的日期。但愿他不会泄露内幕。

translation: 归还；反射；恢复
examples: Has he given back the tools he borrowed from you?They decided to give it back to its owner.Give the book back to your brother.She was shepherded back home by her boyfriend.Mirrors are used to reflect back the sunlight.Sound waves will reflect back from a solid surface.The holiday gave him back his good spirits.I came back from my holiday with renewed strength.
他向你借的那些工具归还了没有？他们决定把它归还原主。把书送回给你兄弟。她的男友将她送回了家。镜子被用来反射阳光。音波将会从坚固的表面反射回去。假期使他恢复了愉快的情绪。我度假回来，体力得到恢复。

translation: v. 屈服；让步；交上
examples: Only a coward gives in to his fate.The rebels were forced to give in.He gave in when he was threatened with torture.The employer is obliged to give in to his employees.The authorities showed no signs of giving in to the kidnapper's demands.Please give your examination papers in (to the teacher) when you've finished.
只有懦夫向命运屈服。叛乱者被迫投降。他在受到严刑威胁时投降了。雇主被迫向他的雇员们让步。当局对绑架者的要求丝毫没有让步的迹象。考卷答完后请上交(给老师)。

translation: 分发，发出；公布，发表；用尽，精疲力竭
examples: The teacher gave out the examination papers.The radiator is giving out a lot of heat.He has refused to give out any information on the matter.The news of the President's death was given out in a radio broadcast.Her patience finally gave out.After a month their food supplies gave out.One of the plane's engines gave out in mid-Atlantic.
教师发了考卷。散热器释放出很多热量。他已拒绝发表有关此事的任何消息。总统逝世的消息已在电台上播出了。她终于失去了耐性。过了一个月，他们的食物已消耗殆尽。飞机在大西洋中部飞行时，其中一个发动机出了故障。

translation: 放弃；交出
examples: She doesn't give up easily.The doctors had given her up but she made a remarkable recovery.You might as well advise me to give up my fortune as my argument.You ought to give up smoking; I gave it up last year.He had to give his passport up to the authorities.
她做任何事都不轻易放弃。医生们已放弃了治愈她的希望，而她却恢复得很好。你劝我停止辩论，倒不如劝我抛弃一切财产。你应该戒烟，我去年就戒掉了。他得把护照交给当局。

translation: 前进；进行
examples: We feel you should go ahead.Go ahead and do what you like.He's going ahead fast.You go ahead and I am coming.Food and fodder should go ahead of troops and horses.
我们觉得您应该干。去吧，喜欢干什么就干什么。他进展很快。你先走一步,我就来。兵马未动，粮草先行。

translation: 走开
examples: Leave me be! Go away!Mischiefs come by the pound, and go away by the ounce.To go away without telling your father is most irregular.It made me sad to hear you have to go away.Before I go away I will call round to say goodbye to you.Don't go away yet.I wish he'd go away; I can't stand the sight of him.
别打扰我! 走开！[谚]灾来如山倒，灾去如抽丝。不跟你父亲打个招呼就走是非常不合适的。听到你非走不可，我觉得很伤心。在我离开以前，我要来看你们，向你们告别。暂时别离开。我希望他离开，我讨厌这个家伙。

translation: 经过；顺便走访；凭…判断；遵循；时间流逝
examples: Farmers used to thrash their wheat by hand.In the past he had to read by candlelight.This task is accomplished by great effort.After a lot of persuasion, she agreed to go.He gave me a cheery wink as I passed by.I saw Xiao Yang walking by, shouldering two hoes.Follow the instructions step by step.By circulation that must be done according to our intent.
农民过去用手打麦脱粒。过去他只得在烛光下攻读。这项任务是经过巨大努力才完成的。经过多次劝说后，她同意去了。我走过的时候他亲切地朝我眨眨眼睛。我看到小扬扛着两把锄头从旁走过。依照指示一步一步地做。藉著循环一定要被依照我们的意图做。

translation: 去钓鱼
examples: People use maggots as bait when they go fishing.I used to (=would often) go fishing.Some people use maggots as bait when they go fishing.He asked me if I would go fishing with him tomorrow.He planed to go fishing for salmon on Sunday.The holiday-makers chartered a boat to go fishing.Who made the decision to go fishing?They would rather go fishing than stay at home.
人们钓鱼时用蛆作钓饵。我以前常去钓鱼。有些人钓鱼时用蛆作钓饵。他问我明天是否和他一起去钓鱼。他计划星期天去钓鲑鱼。渡假者租了一艘船去钓鱼。是谁决定去钓鱼的？他们宁愿去钓鱼，也不愿待在家里。

translation: 去找；被认为；主张；拥护；努力获取
examples: He left his home to look for employment.She rummaged about in the drawer for a pencil.If the sound seems okay, go for dynamics and effects.He is always regarded as good for nothing.For a long time the earth is thought of as flat.He urged that they go to New York.Such opinions pave the way for social change.The newspaper is whooping for leftist candidates.We stand up for the cause of liberty and justice.The speaker went for his opponent.She felt nothing but hatred for her attacker.
他离家去找职业。她在抽屉里翻来翻去找铅笔。如果声音好，努力获取动态和效果。他被认为是个一事无成的人。过去很长时间地球被认为是扁平的。他极力主张他们去纽约。这种主张为社会变革铺路。这家报纸热烈拥护左派候选人。我们拥护自由和正义。演讲者攻击对手。她对攻击她的人只有恨。

translation: v. 散步
examples: Would you like to go for a walk after dinner?I expect I'll take my children for a walk.
你愿意晚饭后去散步吗？我想我会带我的孩子去散步。

translation: 参加，从事；追求；赞成
examples: I don't go in for loud popular music.He must have have a magnificient build before his stomach go in for a career of its own.Many people went in for writing, music, dramatics and similar activities.Most girls do not go in for rough games.
我不喜欢喧闹的流行音乐。当他的肚子还未酷爱其份内的工作放开量大吃大喝）之前，他一定已经有了副强健的体格。很多人从事绘画、音乐、演剧和其他类似活动。大多数女孩子不参加粗野的游戏。

translation: 离开；进行；变质；睡去；断掉；爆炸
examples: The bomb went off in a crowded street.The bomb was timed to go off at 12 o'clock.Hamlet goes off stage left.The headache went off quite suddenly.The thieves ran away when the burglar alarm went off.The car alarm went off as John Doe was trying to steal the car.Everything went off according to plan.The ceremony went off without a hitch.Fish soon goes off in this hot weather.We haven't a fridge and the milk goes off within a day in hot weather.
炸弹在熙来攘往的街道上爆炸了。炸弹定在12点钟爆炸。哈姆雷特从舞台左侧退下。头疼突然消失了。防盗警报器一响，盗贼立刻逃走了。当某人试著偷那台车时，汽车警报器响起了。一切都按照计划进行。典礼进行得很顺利。在这么热的天气里鱼很快会变质。我们没有电冰箱，牛奶在热天一天就变质了。

translation: 继续；过去；继续下去；发生
examples: Let us go on to the next item on the agenda.She hesitated for a moment, and then went on.Go on this street till you see the cinema.Are you alive to what is going on?
让我们继续讨论议程上的下一个项目。她迟疑了一下,然后接着说。沿街往前走直到你看见电影院。你注意到正在发生的事吗?

translation: 继续；进行；暂时使用
examples: Rainy as it be, they go on with their work.I will go on with my work unless I get the order to the contrary.
虽然是雨天，他们仍继续工作。我将继续工作直到我得到相反的命令。

translation: 出去；熄灭；过时
examples: He goes out drinking most evenings.The fire has gone out.Flared trousers went out years ago.Terry has been going out with Sharon for six weeks.That team went out in the third round.Our daughter went out to Australia ten years ago.The Detroit auto workers went out for higher pay.
晚上他差不多都到外边喝酒。火已熄灭。喇叭裤多年前就不时兴了。特里和沙伦相恋有六个星期了。那个队在第三轮比赛中被淘汰了。我们的女儿十年前出国到澳大利亚去了。底特律的汽车工人为争取提高工资而罢工。

translation: 复习，重温；仔细检查；转变；润色
examples: Let's just go over these figures again.She went over her lines before the first night of the play.Tom went over the text before the exam.Don't go over that line or your throw won't count.She went over to the Republicans after their election victory.She's gone over to a milder brand of cigarettes.These actors went over very well with the audience.
我们再检查一下这些数字吧。她在该剧首演前又练习了一次台词。汤姆考试前复习课文。别越过那条线，否则你的投掷就会被判无效。她在共和党取得选举胜利后转向了他们。她已改吸另一牌子味道较淡的香烟。这些演员深受观众们的欢迎。

translation: 参加；经受；仔细检查；通过
examples: The child is going through a difficult phase.They went through the agonies of war and famine.He thought it his duty to go through the papers.I had a browse through the books on her shelf.I browsed through some magazines while I waited.
那孩子正经历困难的阶段。他们经历了战争和饥荒的痛苦。他认为自己有责任检查这些文件。我浏览了一下她书架上的书。我边等边浏览几本杂志。

translation: 成长，逐渐形成
examples: My daughter is in such a hurry to grow up.You'll change your mind as you grow older.She will grow up to be a fine woman.Grow with the company and share the achivement.
我女儿恨不得一下子就长大。你长大些就会改变想法的。她将成长为一名优秀的妇女。我希望能与公司共同成长，能和公司分享胜利的果实。
